summary: Rescued from the deadly assault on their headquarters, Rune Balot finds temporary shelter in paradise a high-tech laboratory where the scramble 09 protocol originated
cast: Leraldo Anzaldua|Chris Ayres|Luci Christian|Justin Doran|Adam Gibbs|Hilary Haag|Corey Hartzog|Megumi Hayashibara|Tsutomu Isobe|Susan O. Koozin|Mark Laskowski|George Manley|Kalob Martinez|Carl Masterson|David Matranga|Andy McAvin|Kazuya Nakai|John Swasey|Hiroki Touchi|David Wald|Brett Weaver|Norito Yashima
title: Marudukku sukuranburu: Nenshou
